name: Crunch Dice
description:
PLAY THE DESKTOP VERSION FOR CRISTAL CLEAR AUDIO

Bla Bla God sent you
Bla Bla Bla save the earth, etc, etc...
Well, time to save some humans
and this time don't crush them nor their houses.
Fall on them only on holed faces !

Control the cube by clicking on the sides
or use the keys TUVN or 1379 on numpad

Have fun !

Music : by the best Yann Roland

Asset : https://mewki.itch.io/nature-isometric-blocks
